channel.title: epistle on dfangx's website
channel.description: Recent content in epistle on dfangx's website

item.title: Titus 3
item.description: The people in Crete are reminded in how they are supposed to live towards authorities, other believers, and towards the general population.

item.title: Titus 1
item.description: Setting of writing: Between 60 AD and 66 AD 1 During the reign of Nero 2 Possibly written in between imprisonments in Rome 3 Written from Nicopolis in Epirus 1 This letter is written by Paul, a slave of God and an apostle of Christ, for Titus, his child in faith.

item.title: Titus 2
item.description: In contrast to the people described, Titus is instructed to teach what is in agreement with sound doctrine. He is to teach others in both instruction and example.
